backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping GA4 tracking requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components, assets, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS theme variables and base styles for light/dark mode with OKLCH tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata and dynamic GA4 script injection via environment variables.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component rendering the site layout and initializing GA4 tracking utilities.
frontend/src/components/BusinessHighligh: Clickable highlight bar showing location, hours, call, and WhatsApp links with icons.
frontend/src/components/MobileCareSmartU: Section listing smartphone care facts with expandable Show more/Show less toggle.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component with automatic error fallback UI and reset behavior when src changes.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Displays a horizontally scrolling ticker with repeated product text.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppQuickMes: Provides a popover button offering preset WhatsApp messages linked to a given number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and utility classes including a ticker animation.
frontend/src/lib/analyticsConfig.ts: Centralizes Google Analytics and GTM configuration using environment variables.
frontend/src/lib/assetVersion.ts: Provides a version constant and helper to append cache‑busting query strings to asset URLs.
frontend/src/lib/clickTracking.ts: Delegated click listener that tracks WhatsApp and tel link clicks via GA4 events.
frontend/src/lib/ga4.ts: Offers safe wrappers for sending GA4 events and page views, no‑oping when GA is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/googleTracking.ts: Initializes GTM and verifies GA availability with idempotent script loading.
frontend/src/lib/scrollDepthTracking.ts: Tracks scroll depth thresholds and sends GA4 events using throttled scroll handling.
frontend/src/lib/spaPageViews.ts: Implements SPA page‑view tracking by patching history methods and listening to popstate to send GA4 page_view events.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with plugins, custom colors, layout settings, animations, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for implementing GA4 tracking, enhanced measurement, and custom analytics events.
